actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee for Indigenous Peoples of the United States.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

Referred to the Committee on Natural Resources, and in addition to the Committees on Energy and Commerce, the Budget, and Education and Labor, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
